name: SubmitApplication
description:
Submit an application to the specified organization.

This tool is used to submit applications to a specified organization using the Entrata service. It should be called when an application needs to be sent for processing.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain of the client to which the application is submitted.

parameters.name: application_data
parameters.description: JSON array containing the application details to be submitted. Include all necessary information relevant to the application.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API
